name: PaulsConsultancy BV
goal: The organisation provides business and technical stratigic innovation consultancy services to profit and none profit organisation related to ICT, IoT and IoE, Cellular, Vehicle, Medical and Industrial functions and technologies.
interests: Communication, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives:
Policies towards 5G, Digital Single Market; European 5G Action Plan; European Transport and Environmental, emission and safety;
EU initiatives: C-ITS Deployment Platform; Data Protection policies; Article 29.
